title: Lamia
data:

|   | A powerful queen of the nagas, said to be willing to eat her own children. Despite her deformed body, she is quite beautiful. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Lamia** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") spellcasting [naga](/List_of_nagas "List of nagas") that can be generated in the [Snake Pit](/Snake_Pit "Snake Pit"). She always generates with a powerful [polearm](/Polearm "Polearm") (often of [distortion](/Distortion "Distortion")) and a [superb item](/Superb_item "Superb item") [naga barding](/Naga_barding "Naga barding"), can [mesmerize](/Mesmerize "Mesmerize") her prey to prevent them from escaping her [coils](/Constriction "Constriction"), and devastates those who fight at range with brutal attack spells.

## Location

- The [Snake Pit](/Snake_Pit "Snake Pit"): 2-5

## Spells

| Spell set |                                                                       |
| :-------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1     | [Orb of Destruction](/Orb_of_Destruction "Orb of Destruction") (9d16) |
| Slot2     | [Mesmerise](/Mesmerise "Mesmerise")                                   |
| Slot3     | [Haste](/Haste "Haste")                                               |
| Slot4     | [Poison Arrow](/Poison_Arrow "Poison Arrow") (3d25)                   |
| Slot5     | *none*                                                                |
| Slot6     | [Teleport Self](/Teleport_Self "Teleport Self")                       |

## Tips & Tricks

- Lamia is one of the deadlier uniques in the mid-game, capable of dealing very heavy damage both in melee and at range. If you cannot casually defeat [naga warriors](/Naga_warrior "Naga warrior") in melee, don't even think of attempting it against Lamia.
- Although you probably won't be in the Snake Pit without it, [poison](/Poison "Poison") resistance is extremely useful when fighting Lamia, if only to significantly reduce the impact of her [Poison Arrows](/Poison_Arrow "Poison Arrow").
- [Clarity](/Clarity "Clarity") will render you immune to her [Mesmerise](/Mesmerise "Mesmerise"), as will very high [magic resistance](/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance"). Losing the ability to flee her, especially when other enemies happen to be around, can be extremely fatal. If all else fails, an *uncontrolled* [teleport](/Teleport "Teleport") will allow you to escape, even if constricted.
- Although you may be able to outrun her, you can't outrun her [Orb of Destruction](/Orb_of_Destruction "Orb of Destruction"). See that spell's article for tips on dealing with it.

## History

Lamia was added in [0.12](/0.12 "0.12") and removed in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").

Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), Lamia traveled with a large band of naga allies.

Lamia

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Lamia N 
HP 200
HD 18
XP 4706
Speed 8 (act: 80%)
AC 6
EV 10
Will Immune
Attack1 40 (hit: plain)
Attack2 12 (constrict: crush)


Resistances rPois+
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence High
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Large
Type naga, naga
Flags Eats corpses
Actual spells
Fighter
See invisible
Speaks
Spellcaster
Unique
Warm-blooded
A powerful queen of the nagas, said to be willing to eat her own children. Despite her deformed body, she is quite beautiful.



Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 History

Useful Info

Lamia is a unique spellcasting naga that can be generated in the Snake Pit. She always generates with a powerful polearm (often of distortion) and a superb item naga barding, can mesmerize her prey to prevent them from escaping her coils, and devastates those who fight at range with brutal attack spells.

Location

  • The Snake Pit: 2-5

Spells

Spell set
Slot1 Orb of Destruction (9d16)
Slot2 Mesmerise
Slot3 Haste
Slot4 Poison Arrow (3d25)
Slot5 none
Slot6 Teleport Self

Tips & Tricks

  • Lamia is one of the deadlier uniques in the mid-game, capable of dealing very heavy damage both in melee and at range. If you cannot casually defeat naga warriors in melee, don't even think of attempting it against Lamia.
  • Although you probably won't be in the Snake Pit without it, poison resistance is extremely useful when fighting Lamia, if only to significantly reduce the impact of her Poison Arrows.
  • Clarity will render you immune to her Mesmerise, as will very high magic resistance. Losing the ability to flee her, especially when other enemies happen to be around, can be extremely fatal. If all else fails, an uncontrolled teleport will allow you to escape, even if constricted.
  • Although you may be able to outrun her, you can't outrun her Orb of Destruction. See that spell's article for tips on dealing with it.

History

Lamia was added in 0.12 and removed in 0.14.

Prior to 0.13, Lamia traveled with a large band of naga allies.

If you cannot casually defeat [[naga warrior]]s in melee, don't even think of attempting it against Lamia. *Although you probably won't be in the Snake Pit without it, [[poison]] resistance is extremely useful when fighting Lamia, if only to significantly reduce the impact of her [[Poison Arrow]]s. *[[Clarity]] will render you immune to her [[Mesmerise]], as will very high [[magic resistance]]. Losing the ability to flee her, especially when other enemies happen to be around, can be extremely fatal.
